name: James Lindley
text: Bad manger place was dirty wont go back

name: Sophia Schweitzer
text: We had a field trip in Sacramento, and we ate at this Round Table Pizza. We were so pleased at their service. They quickly made personal pizzas for 45 very hungry people. Thank you so much for helping to make our day great!

name: Chandra LaStrappe
text: My pizza was good. Customer service was good. They were super busy but still made an effort to be nice to guests. They can be a little nicer to each other if you ask me lol but overall my experience this time around was great.

name: Karina Dickerson
text: Best Round Table in Natomas...I order here two times a month, pizza is always cooked perfectly.  I recently tried the RT off Arena , it was horrible. Truxel and San Juan RT has.  The best pizza and excellent customer service.

name: Stefen Hopkins
text: The staff here are to an extent courteous. I ran into a rude employee, someone already was ringing me out and they came took over. Had the male cashier stood his ground, I would have tipped. However, the rudeness of the other associates, â€¦More

name: Fred Kurzweil
text: awesome pizza.  I have been eating Round Table Pizza for almost 50 years and I've loved every bit of it. My pizzas are usually hot fresh and very inviting. I rarely have an issue with anything and if I do, it's resolved quickly. This â€¦More

name: Constancia Nabarrete
text: There is a funky smell when you walk in the door and through out the restaurant.  I think maybe it is time for a new carpet?  We decided to eat in anyway because we were starving.  The pizza was delicious!  Knocked off one star for the funky smell.

name: Lorraina Minnehan
text: Unprofessional, cleanliness is below acceptable, prices are outrageous, and standards are less than par in general. Super bummer because Round Table used to be my absolute favorite. They have been going downhill for a while now. ðŸ˜©

name: Shalon Marie
text: Enjoyed it, no soliciting problems, they have security on hand, and we were not being disturbed by anyone.

name: Alicia Dresbach
text: They have good pizza but almost every time I go there they never get our order right. The older whites woman is a great woman  is the only one that has ever gotten our order right,unfortunately not tonight.

name: Jim Campbell
text: Some really good pizza today better than most days

name: Rodney Hicks
text: Best chain pizza.  Luigi's best small business pizza in Sacramento.

name: steven hammer
text: Had the king Arthur combo. As usual it was excellent.

name: IRONFINGERZ
text: Dirty tables dusty atmosphere dimly lit 2 games one big screen lots of tables big place lots of room. Young staff. It's an ok spot been around for years.

name: Jerremy Smyth
text: Round table or bust... Great pizza to take out "Mombo wombo"... Large and extra-large half-price Monday night..

name: Serita L. Dykes-Katz
text: The last honest pizza for real! Real ingredients, real dough, real Pizza! Delicious! I'm a salad bar was well stocked with fresh ingredients!

name: Thomas Hara
text: Good pizza but very expensive. But hey, what can I say? I am just a teenager that went there just to have lunch with my friends. I kinda had to borrow money from them tho. However the service was good and some arcade games were fun to play. â€¦More

name: rob boswell
text: Best all you can eat pizza place. Wish they had plain sausage pizza but it was still good. The games (connect 4) were a nice touch

name: Afrika Scott
text: Love this place. A little pricey but worth the extra dollars.

name: James Esparza
text: Ok place. Service slow but buffet was decent. Good for groups of 5 to 15. The restaurant seemed understaffed as staff members were multi-tasking to take care of clients.

name: Vinod Sujan
text:
Superb service inside the restaurant
Delicious Pizza and made fast

name: Kimberly Jones
text: I work there it's got good food and we keep it clean ad we're all friendly

name: Steven Kincaid
text: I shouldn't even give this place one star.  We came in on a Saturday evening and right off the bat the place was empty, tables weren't clean, my wife and I decided to order the salad bar and my wife caught that there was a used band-aid in â€¦More

name: Vanessa Contreras
text: Always good service and fresh pizza! Only took off one star because their prices are a bit too much. But other than that, great place!

name: Erik Whedbee
text: So I went into Round Table on the 11th and placed an order for $42.70, she ran my card and said it was declined. She ran it two more times and both were declined, even thought I had plenty of money in my account. The manager came up and ran â€¦More

name: life of Prokopovich
text: Pizza was fast and really delicious. However, the place is older and needs updating. The area is also not so safe so I held my purse tight and made sure our car was locked.

text: Love their lunch buffets.

text: Terrible Customer Service and Rude manager named "Grace". I am a RT Pizza Fan. The other night I was talking by phone to my daughter who is working in another country. It was 9:30 pm and I said I was hungry. She said she was ordering me â€¦More

name: Dae
text: Garlic twist were way over cooked. My triple play pepperoni pizza was just a regular pepperoni. The customer service was not all that great. Not to satisfied with going to location

name: Nathan Boeger
text: Great pizza. I love their sauce. A bit pricey, except the lunch buffet, which is a really great deal.

name: Estephany Cardenas
text: Service isnt great, the buffet was expensive and the pizzas are thin and flavorless. Not coming back.

text: This round table has horrible customer service. I asked for one thing and got something way worse. If anything the ones in west Sacramento and old Sacramento are many times better and treat customers with good vibes

text: This place needs some TLC. Not very welcoming when going inside as the outside of the facility is trashy and makes you doubt the decision on eating there. Inside, it's dingy.

text: Came in on 5th of july, very slow day the lobby was empty spent 20 mins on the phone on hold trying to order pizza. So once came in, i ordered our pizza... it was $45... which is okay and pizza tasted amazing!!!! â€¦More

text: Food was good and fresh. For lunch it was good. Would definitely come back

name: Jacklynn Rodriguez
text: Went there last night for dinner. The order was accidentally made incorrectly and we were offered a side as an apology. The manager went above and beyond what is expected from a pizza joint nowadays. Best customer service I've ever witnessed. Thank you very much!

text: We went for our board game group. We're didn't have the food so we can't speak to that, but it was unbearably hot in the afternoon and the staff basically said "oh well". . .

As I am listening to the girl ramble the pizza cutter is cutting random pizzas with the same pizza cutter not washing it in between the pizzas. I will not be back here!
